name: YahooFantasyFootball
0:
”Alexa, ask Yahoo Fantasy Football about my matchup”
”Alexa, ask Yahoo Fantasy Football to show me the forecast for Julio Jones this coming week”
”Alexa, ask Yahoo Fantasy Football about Baker Mayfield's stats for this week”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yahoo fantasy football
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Does your line-up have what it takes? Login and link one of your existing Yahoo Fantasy Football Head-2-Head leagues to this skill to track your team as they make their play for the championship. Competing in multiple Head-2-Head leagues? No problem, just say ‘Change league’ to easily switch to another league. 

Use the Alexa skill to:
– View your players’ fearless forecast video for the upcoming week on video capable devices
– Get an overview of your team’s weekly matchup and score.
– Get your roster’s injury/bye status. 
– Get player performance updates.

——

NOTE:
Do Not Sell My Info https://www.verizonmedia.com/policies/us/en/verizonmedia/privacy/california/index.html#right-to-opt-out
This skill currently SUPPORTS Head-to-Head fantasy leagues only. It DOES NOT support Points leagues or Pick’Em. In order to see your players fearless forecast, you need a video capable device.
